Title: Thanksgiving
Writer: Aziz Ansari (created by), Aziz Ansari, Lena Waithe, Alan Yang (created by)
Actors: Aziz Ansari, Lena Waithe, Angela Bassett, Kym Whitley
Plot: Over a series of Thanksgivings from the '90s to the present, Denise settles into her sexuality and faces the challenge of coming out to her family.
